text: Hi folks - is there a way to access/use the data displayed inside a `CrmAssociationTable` as an object? I’m trying to make use of Deal Split values/percentages for a particular calculation, however not having much success as this isn’t available via API. The only way I’ve been able to display it is through the association table using the objectType `0-72` . Thanks!
For a `crm.record.tab` extension, are there plans for being able to dynamically change the title — like to add a counter or a “new activity” badge?
